publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-217 Nigel Don: Aberdeen Forward’s Sustainable Supplies—That the Parliament praises Aberdeen City Council’s decision to allow Aberdeen Forward’s Creative Waste Exchange charity to supply sustainable office equipment, arts and decoration material to schools, community centres and other public organisations; notes the positive environmental and economic consequences of such a decision, including a reduction in landfill contribution, manufacturing and transportation costs, and encourages other local authorities to pursue similar initiatives.
